name: ReTerra
description:
ReTerra is a high-score based management arcade game. The game takes place on a barren Earth and your job is to recolonize it. Manage power and the environment as you try to grow your population to restore the Earths former glory.

Small note, the web build is missing some sounds because they were too short.

Controls:

Key(s)BindEscapeOpen / close menu
WASDMove camera
ArrowsMove camera
QNew turn
IToggle tile information
FCollapse stats menu

Credits:

Nature & Musical Ambiance - Sounds provided by Erokia/Jordan Powell from Freesound.org

Source:

ReTerra github repo (Unity project)
